settings.tab_2_inner_1_des:
DISPATCH TIMES

  • Items will be dispatched within 1 business day excluding public holidays.

Estimated Delivery Times (after dispatch):

  • Metro - NSW, VIC & SA: 1-3 business days after dispatch
  • Non Metro - NSW, VIC & SA: 3-5 business days after dispatch
  • Metro - QLD, TAS & WA: 2-6 business days after dispatch
  • Non Metro - QLD, TAS & WA: 2-7 business days after dispatch
  • Regional - QLD, NT & WA: 3-7 business days after dispatch
settings.tab_2_inner_2_des:
• If you receive a faulty item or are not completely satisfied with your purchase, we offer a hassle-free returns policy. You may return the item within 30days from the date of purchase, provided it is unused and in its original packaging.

  • To initiate a return, please Contact us with your order details and the reason for the return. We will guide you through the process and provide you with further instructions. Please note that return shipping costs will apply, unless the return is due to a faulty or damaged item.
